title: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin Argues for Blockchain 'Privacy Pools' to Weed Out Criminals
description: The paper argues for “privacy pools,” a blockchain tech feature that would enhance the privacy of user’s transactions while also distinguishing criminal activity from innocent funds.

title: Tornado Cash Developer Roman Storm Pleads Not Guilty to Money Laundering, Other Charges
description: Tornado Cash developer Roman Storm pleaded "not guilty" to charges of conspiring to operate a money transmitter or facilitate money laundering and sanctions evasion in a court appearance Wednesday.

title: The Most Anticipated Crypto and NFT Games
description: UPDATED: Lavish titles like Parallel and Deadrop are poised to redefine blockchain gaming. Here's what to watch for in 2023 and beyond.

title: Alex Mashinksy’s assets were frozen by court order in August
description:
A federal court in New York issued a Post-Indictment Restraining Order against Alexander Mashinsky, former CEO of the bankrupt cryptocurrency lender Celsius Network, on August 16, 2023, freezing his assets and prohibiting any transactions. The order became public knowledge on September 5, when select documents revealing the asset freeze were unsealed. The restraining order, which […]

The post Alex Mashinksy’s assets were frozen by court order in August appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: 5 Best Crypto Projects to Watch Out For
description: Ahead of the next Bitcoin halving, which is expected to occur in April 2024, interest in the cryptocurrency space is starting to pick up again.

title: Cosmos Migration Slated For dYdX, Decentralized Order Book In Development
description: dYdX' move to establish a 'purely decentralized' order book reflects an industry-wide quest to further these decentralized ideals.

title: $21 Million in ‘Sleeping Bitcoins’ Awaken After Years of Dormancy
description: Despite Bitcoin’s (BTC) price dipping 6.4% this week and hovering below the $26K mark, a flurry of activity was noted between September 5th and 6th as several substantial ‘sleeping bitcoins’ stirred. After a lull of slightly over six years, an individual splurged 359.92 BTC, equivalent to $9.2 million, across eight distinct transactions. Moreover, on Wednesday, […]

title: Hedera (HBAR) Achieves Milestone: Surpasses 20 Billion Mainnet Transactions
description: Hedera has officially crossed the 20 billion total mainnet transaction mark after hitting 10 billion in 6.5 years.  The asset has fallen by 11 percent in the last seven days to trade at $0.049102 according to market data.  In 2019, Hedera Hashgraph (HBAR), an electronic public ledger developed for corporate use launched its mainnet.
